an5.71:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma bhavita bahulikata cetovimuttiphala ca honti cetovimuttiphalanisamsa ca, pannavimuttiphala ca honti pannavimuttiphalanisamsa ca.
an5.71:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhanupassi kaye viharati, ahare patikulasanni, sabbaloke anabhiratasanni, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassi, maranasanna kho panassa ajjhattam supatthita hoti.
an5.71:2.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma bhavita bahulikata cetovimuttiphala ca honti cetovimuttiphalanisamsa ca, pannavimuttiphala ca honti pannavimuttiphalanisamsa ca.
an5.71:2.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cetovimutto ca hoti pannavimutto ca hoti—
an5.71:2.5: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho itipi, sankinnaparikho itipi, abbulhesiko itipi, niraggalo itipi, ariyo pannaddhajo pannabharo visamyutto itipi’.
an5.71:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijja pahina hoti ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
an5.71:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti.
an5.71:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobhaviko jatisamsaro pahino hoti ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
an5.71:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sankinnaparikho hoti.
an5.71:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tanha pahina hoti ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
an5.71:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbulhesiko hoti.
an5.71:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pancorambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani honti ucchinnamulani talavatthukatani anabhavankatani ayatim anuppadadhammani.
an5.71:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niraggalo hoti.
an5.71:7.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabharo visamyutto hoti?
an5.71:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimano pahino hoti ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
an5.71:7.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabharo visamyutto hoti”ti.
